`i`,`tabel_dpa`.`j` AS `j`,`tabel_dpa`.`k` AS `k`,`tabel_dpa`.`l` AS `l`,`tabel_dpa`.`m` AS `m`,`tabel_dpa`.`n` AS `n`,`tabel_dpa`.`o` AS `o`,`tabel_dpa`.`id_jenis_pemeliharaan` AS `id_jenis_pemeliharaan`,`tabel_dpa`.`uraian_pemeliharaan` AS `uraian_pemeliharaan`,`tabel_dpa`.`catatan` AS `catatan`,`tabel_dpa`.`satuan_barang` AS `satuan_barang`,`tabel_dpa`.`satuan_rek` AS `tahun`,`tabel_dpa`.`jenis_anggaran` AS `jenis_anggaran`,`tabel_dpa`.`id_tahap` AS `id_tahap`,`ref_tahap_anggaran`.`no_urut` AS `no_urut`,`tabel_dpa`.`nama_modul` AS `nama_modul`,`tabel_dpa`.`rincian_perhitungan` AS `rincian_perhitungan`,`tabel_dpa`.`volume_rek` AS `volume_rek`,`tabel_dpa`.`jumlah` AS `jumlah`,`tabel_dpa`.`id_rincian_belanja` AS `id_rincian_belanja`,`tabel_dpa`.`rincian_volume` AS `rincian_volume`,`tabel_dpa`.`sumber_dana` AS `sumber_dana`,`tabel_dpa`.`jumlah1` AS `jumlah1`,`tabel_dpa`.`jumlah2` AS (`tabel_dpa` join `ref_tahap_anggaran` on((`tabel_dpa`.`id_tahap` = `ref_tahap_anggaran`.`id_tahap`))) where ((`tabel_dpa`.`nama_modul` = 'DPA-SKPD') and (`tabel_dpa`.`jenis_rka` = '1')) order by concat(`tabel_dpa`.`bk`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`ck`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`dk`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`p`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`q`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`k`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`l`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`m`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`o`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`id_rincian_belanja`,'.',`tabel_dpa`.`rincian_perhitungan`)
